about_the_game:
[Game Description]

This game is designed for Ninth Games' VTuber Kuiri Lulu's birthday. Players will take on the role of Kuiri Lulu, who receives a mysterious invitation on the eve of her birthday. She wakes up in a foggy forest and must find the correct path to reach her birthday party.

[Gameplay]

The game is a short walking simulator inspired by Exit 8 but incorporates FPS shooting elements.

While exploring the forest, players must eliminate anomalies using a handgun if encountered; otherwise, they proceed directly.

The game is only available in Chinese, but if you understand the description of anomalies mentioned above, you should be able to complete the game without issues.

[Playtime]

Approximately 15–60 minutes

[Options]

You can adjust graphics settings, mouse sensitivity, camera shake, and other preferences in the options menu.

[Kuiri Lulu's Channel]

name: The Ninth Forset

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i9
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
